question_text: In the past week, have you ... - purchased locally produced food?
In the past week, have you ... - eaten at least one lunch without meat?
In the past week, have you ... - consumed oat milk?
In the past week, have you ... - purchased organic fruits or vegetables?
In the past week, have you ... - brought your own lunch to work or school?
In the past week, have you ... - consumed tofu or meat-substitutes?
In the past week, have you... - used the cold water setting to wash your clothes?
In the past week, have you... - hung clean clothes to dry?
In the past week, have you... - went around your house and turned off lights not in use?
In the past week, have you ... - carried reusable utensils or straws while you were away from home?
In the past week, have you ... - composted yard or food waste?
In the past week, have you ... - picked up litter?
In the past week, have you ... - pulled something recyclable out of a trash can even though it was not yours?
In the past week, have you ... - used reusable washcloths or rags for household cleaning?
In the past week, have you ... - carried a reusable water bottle with you?
In the past week, have you ... - used a reusable coffee/tea travel thermos?
In the past week, have you ... - reused plastic or paper bags?
In the past week, have you ... - browsed or participated in a buy-nothing group?
In the past week, have you ... - watched a nature documentary?
In the past week, have you ... - participated in a community group focused on environmental issues facing your community?
In the past week, have you ... - participated in a community group or communicated with others about environmental issues facing your community?
In the past week, have you ... - read about wildlife, nature, or environmental issues?
In the past week, have you ... - posted any information, articles, or content that are supportive of policies or practices aimed at protecting the environment or promoting sustainability?
In the past week, have you ... - used public transportation?
In the past week, have you ... - walked as a form of transportation?
In the past week, have you ... - turned off the water in the middle of a shower (e.g. while soaping up, shaving, etc.)?
In the past week, have you ... - turned off the water while brushing your teeth?
